reviews.title: To date
reviews.body: To date, having just opened a Cash ISA, I have found the level of communication to be excellent and if there are no changes in the continuing level of communication, I do not feel that I have made the wrong choice to go with YBS.

reviews.title: Very good news  all of the time
reviews.body: Very good news  all of the time

reviews.title: Really poor service
reviews.body: As a first time buyer I had come to YBS for my AIP as reviews in the whole area good. I applied for the AIG online and once I had this I called the â€˜mortgage advisorsâ€™ as informed in the AIG to ensure I had chosen the most appropriate mortgage. I was told we cannot advise you and we really are not able to discuss particulars of each mortgage. However confident I chosen the correct one I completed the full application. I called again to ensure the application had been received and to ask a few other minor questions. A few days later had not heard not even a confirmation email so called again and was transferred to the underwriters. Again asked a few questions to ensure I had everything correct and all seemed well. I received a telephone call today advising â€˜sorry we donâ€™t mortgage a flat itâ€™s just policy but we can keep your account open if you want to choose another houseâ€™. Firstly this is not a pair of shoes itâ€™s not as simple as picking another itâ€™s the house I will live in for the rest of my life. Really disappointing that at no point going through all of this information 3 times that someone didnâ€™t think to mention it was all a huge waste of time. Really poor service and why advertise mortgage advisors who are not permitted to advise.

reviews.title: Different in a very good way
reviews.body: Rate of interest on instant access savings is brilliant. Staff helpful, very easy to open account, no hoops to jump through, no nonsense. When I say my branch has it's own phone number and a real person who's actually there answers your call, do you need to know anything else?

reviews.title: friendly knowledgeable staff very happyâ€¦
reviews.body: friendly knowledgeable staff very happy with the service

reviews.title: Been with them for my first mortgageâ€¦
reviews.body: Been with them for my first mortgage and was great. Then I've done a full house renovation, house has been valued twice (by a company and a friend whos a surveyor) and both came at the same price of 60-70k more which is what I expected. Then on my re-mortgage I decided to pay yorkshire building society Â£70 for their re-evaluation (other companies had theirs free if I changed providers) and they used a terrible company with 2* reviews everywhere, the guy came out, took some pictures and left. didnt ask about electric, boiler, windows NOTHING. Then i get told me house is worth 25k more hahaha what an absolute joke. because of this joke I will be switching lenders. waste of money.

reviews.title: Found opening an account easy on line. Then I had a young lady thanking me for opening an account and explaining if I needed any help to phone my local Yorkshire branch. Fantastic service thank you
reviews.body: Found it easy to open on line

reviews.title: Opening online account needs major overhaul.....
reviews.body: Trying to open an account has been the most frustrating experience....one and the same set of documents was accepted for savings account, yet keeps being rejected for ISA. Still at a loss as to why.....I have contacted YBS customer services, they were unable to solve the problem, but admitted the system needs improvement.

reviews.title: I did have my savings in the Mansfieldâ€¦
reviews.body: I did have my savings in the Mansfield bs but it was impossible to speak over the phone. With Yorkshire I can phone the branch straight away if I have any questions.

reviews.title: Easy to follow on the app
reviews.body: Easy to follow on the app. A good all round service compared with other building societies.

reviews.body: Making appointments was really easy. Went into appointment on time. Went through options. And discussed what would be best

reviews.title: Most things are very good
reviews.body: Most things are very good. I would like to see it easier to roll over an ISA into the next equivalent issue without having to start again with a submission for a new ISA.

reviews.title: Could not save money I wanted to
reviews.body: Could not save money I wanted to, had to open another account elsewhere .it said I could save Â£250 a month but when I reached Â£200 it wouldnâ€™t let me save more,it said I had exceeded my limit.if I would have known that I would not have opened the account in the first place.

reviews.title: ID Problem!
reviews.body: ID Problem!I filled out my application to the end. This ID of my driving licence just doesn't work! Photo advice of Too bright, too dull, too blurry, edges don't match, bring item closer, too close etc etc then failed application of the photo. I'm out! ðŸ‘‹

reviews.title: Fine example of good customer service!
reviews.body: The customer service staff are well trained and keep things simple and easy for the customer.  They are proactive and responsive.The Bank's products are straightforward, not unnecessarily complex and their interest rates are very competitive.My experience with them has always been good.

reviews.title: Very easy to open an account with efficient service.
reviews.body: Very easy to open an account and website gave useful information to make informed decisions. The service was quick and efficient.

reviews.title: YBS failed to honour  fixed rate weeks after account opened
reviews.body: I opened an ISA a few weeks ago for a fixed rate ISA for 12 months . I then get a message this week saying they made a mistake and that actual rate was lower than I was quoted and I  would get a lower rate than I was quoted.I have never come across this before . You canâ€™t quote a customer a fixed rate of return then change it afterwards . YBSshould honour the fixed rate they offered

reviews.body: I would Highly recommend  yorkshire building society. The savings interest rates are excellent. Always  friendly staff at the local branch  or on the phone.

reviews.body: Erratic transfer times. My accounts with other banks can transfer immediately. YBS may take 1 hr or over 1 day. No excuse.

reviews.title: We had a very good initial meeting .
reviews.body: We had a very good initial meeting with Yorkshire building society  customer service agent. She was very friendly and helpful giving us good advice. She made us feel relaxed and was able to do everything we expected in a calm professional way.

reviews.title: Claire @ lewes branch.
reviews.body: What an easy experience. Claire at the Lewes branch helped so much with the process of opening up of our joint savings account. Her knowledge was brilliant and attention to detail was fabulous. I will be recommending due to customer service alone. Thank you.

reviews.title: Service - Above and Beyond
reviews.body: I contacted Yorkshire BS about a charge against my property.  Turns out I was given incorrect information. Without asking, Yorkshire BS contacted the actual mortgage provider and requested the charge to be removed.  They could have just contacted me and then I would have done it.  No, Salmon and the guys went above and beyond and did it for me.  Outstanding Service.

reviews.title: Friendly and knowledgeable
reviews.body: I received a friendly service that allowed me to manage my money with confidence. The branch was clean and comfortable with an appointment offered at a time to suit me.

reviews.title: Face to face help and guidance
reviews.body: Very quick and easy to open a saving account with suitable checks to ensure no money laundering. High street store so face to face help and guidance on what was available.

reviews.title: Not impressed.....
reviews.body: The number rang more than once - they did not know who they were supposed to be speaking to - and they were polite in the salutation but rude when a savvy person refused to give their personal details over.In this day and age when persons can claim that they are working for an organisation - if you do not bank with that organisation - then it is savvy not to provide them with your personal details.

reviews.title: Coral helped me to find the rightâ€¦
reviews.body: Coral helped me to find the right savings account for me . She took me through all the relevant steps and facts making me to understand how I could be an excellent saver.YBS is the go to right building society.

reviews.title: Really easy to work with
reviews.body: Friendly, supportive, and really easy to work with - took all the stress out of buying my first home.  Also, the 'Welcome to your new home' gift was a lovely touch, and clever too!
